name: Eduard Iateniuc
title: Full Stack Developer
bio: Passionate full stack developer with extensive experience building modern web applications. Specialized in creating elegant solutions using cutting-edge technologies. I enjoy tackling complex problems and turning ideas into reality through clean, efficient code.

experience.description: Leading development of enterprise web applications, mentoring junior developers, and implementing CI/CD practices.
Administration of AWS services, development of RESTful APIs, and integration of third-party services.
Created responsive web interfaces and implemented designs using modern JavaScript frameworks.

projects.name: E-commerce Market - Trend MD
projects.description: Developed a full-featured e-commerce platform using React and Java Spring Boot. Implemented user authentication, product management, and payment processing.

projects.name: Parking Management System
projects.description: Designed and implemented a parking management system using Java Spring Boot and MySQL. Developed RESTful APIs for user authentication and parking space management.

projects.name: Telegram Casino Bot
projects.description: Created a Telegram bot for a casino game using Java and PostgreSQL. Implemented user authentication and game logic.
